public class SmithWatermanGotohWindowedAffine
extends AbstractStringMetric
implements java.io.Serializable

Package: uk.ac.shef.wit.simmetrics.similaritymetrics Description: SmithWatermanGotohWindowedAffine implements the smith waterman with gotoh extension using a windowed affine gap. Date: 23-Apr-2004 Time: 14:25:30

Version:
1.1
Author:
Sam Chapman
